subject: Fwd: AdWords Account
preview: Hi Michael, Sorry about the delay on this... it went to my junk mail. Can you please send requests to support@wpperk.com? Hopefully those will make it through. That's great news about the enquiries

full_threads.body:
Hi Michael, 

Sorry about the delay on this... it went to my junk mail. 

Can you please send requests to support@wpperk.com? Hopefully those will make it through. 

That's great news about the enquiries!! Nice!! 

I have setup the Thank you message as a separate page that loads once the form is submitted: https://deepbluelearning.com.au/thank-you/

So you are good to go!

Hi mate

See below. We are starting to get some traffic, even had 2 phone calls!

Apparently if we add this we can track the contact forms for the data.

Michael Hann

p 02 9659 2201

m 0407 119 631

e michael@deepbluelearning.com.au <mailto:michael@deepbluelearning.com.au>
www.deepbluelearning.com.au <http://www.deepbluelearning.com.au/> www.dblevents.com.au <http://www.dblevents.com.au/>


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Claudia Bobonica <claudia.bobonica@constantclicks.com.au <mailto:claudia.bobonica@constantclicks.com.au>>
Date: Tue, 13 Nov 2018 at 16:22
Subject: Re: AdWords Account
To: Michael Hann <michael@deepbluelearning.com.au <mailto:michael@deepbluelearning.com.au>>


Hi Michael,

Could your web developer change the url that is shown after contact forms are submitted? Or in other words, add a /thankyou url for contact form submissions.


Thank you in advance; it will make tracking goals in analytics a lot easier.



Regards,

On Tue, Nov 13, 2018 at 3:18 PM Michael Hann <michael@deepbluelearning.com.au <mailto:michael@deepbluelearning.com.au>> wrote:
Can you please email me exactly what you need him to do.

Thanks.

Michael Hann
0407 119 631
www.deepbluelearning.com.au <http://www.deepbluelearning.com.au/>


On 13 Nov 2018, at 4:16 pm, Claudia Bobonica <claudia.bobonica@constantclicks.com.au <mailto:claudia.bobonica@constantclicks.com.au>> wrote:

> Ok then, can your web developer implement a change in url for when contact forms are submitted? Please.
>
> On Tue, Nov 13, 2018 at 3:15 PM Michael Hann <michael@deepbluelearning.com.au <mailto:michael@deepbluelearning.com.au>> wrote:

>
> Michael Hann
> 0407 119 631
> www.deepbluelearning.com.au <http://www.deepbluelearning.com.au/>
>

>> Hi Michael,
>>
>> Is it too late to ask your web developer to add a change in url for contact form submissions?
>>
>> On Tue, Nov 13, 2018 at 2:46 PM Michael Hann <michael@deepbluelearning.com.au <mailto:michael@deepbluelearning.com.au>> wrote:
>> ok, let's go live.
>> Michael Hann

>> On Tue, 13 Nov 2018 at 15:03, Claudia Bobonica <claudia.bobonica@constantclicks.com.au <mailto:claudia.bobonica@constantclicks.com.au>> wrote:
>> Hi Michael,
>>
>> I have created your new adwords account for Deep Blue Learning; please find attached snapshots of the account's ad groups, keywords and ads.
>>
>> The average cost per click for these keywords is around $5.50 (some go up to $7 and some are around $10). I think that if we aim for around position 3 to 4; a budget of $35 per day to begin with will allow us to see how the market reacts to the ads. We may need to increase, we may not....I won't know until I run the ads and see their positions and see how your audiences react to you when you're sitting in 3/4th position.
>>
>> I will create a new analytics property for this account and get it installed on the site with the logins you've provided. I have been advised that there will be a $19 one off fee for conversion tracking code installation, so I wanted to make you aware of this.
>>
>> Let me know if you have any questions about the ads etc; and if not I will activate tomorrow and see how we go.
>>
>> --
